column1: 1On 1st July 2014 Barnet & Chase Farm Hospitals NHS Trust merged with Royal Free Hospital NHS Trust. Data prior to July 2014 for Barnet & Chase Farm Hospitals NHS Trust and Royal Free Hospital NHS Trust are combined and displayed under Royal Free Hospital NHS Trust.

2On 1st October 2014 North West London NHS Trust and Ealing Hopsitals NHS Trust merged to form London North West Healthcare. Data prior to October 2014 for North West London NHS Trust and Ealing Hopsitals NHS Trust are combined and displayed under London North West Healthcare NHS Trust

3 On 1st November 2014 Frimley Park NHS Foundation Trust and Heatherwood and Wexham Park NHS Trust merged to form Frimley Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust. Data prior to November 2014 for Frimley Park NHS Foundation Trust and Heatherwood and Wexham Park NHS Trust are combined and displayed under Frimley Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust

4 On 1st February 2015 Royal United Hospital Bath NHS Foundation Trust merged with Royal Hopsital for Rheumatic Diseases NHS Trust. Data prior to February 2015 for Royal United Hospital Bath NHS Foundation Trust and Rheumatic Diseases NHS Trust are combined and displayed under Royal United Hospital Bath NHS Foundation Trust.

¥On 1st November 2014 Mid Staffordshire NHS Foundation Trust was dissolved and services redistributed among the University Hospitals North Staffordshire NHS Trust and The Royal Wolverhampton Hospitals NHS Trust.  This reallocation of services will have led to an increase in reported cases for the recieving Trusts.
NB: Wirral University Teaching Hospital NHS Trust have not submitted E. coli bacteraemia data since February 2014.
